overview.en: X-BBC是全球首个公链 +5G 应用架构的价值生态网络体系，可以实现去中心化的网络存储，网络速度优化，平衡网络带宽，避免黑客攻击，DDoS攻击，钓鱼网站等
overview.zh: X-BBC is the world's first value ecological network system of public chain + 5G application architecture, which can realize decentralized network storage, network speed optimization, and balanced network bandwidth. It can defense hacking attacks, DDoS attacks, and phishing websites.
